DOC.detailed_description: The purpose APBI Proton Therapy study examine feasibility , side effect , clinical efficacy use proton therapy tumor bed woman treat breast cancer surgical removal malignancy ( opposed whole breast treatment ) . The study 's aim establish effect type therapy compare traditional radiation whole breast treatment therapy . In order eligible , patient must female old 50 either invasive ductal , medullary , papillary , colloid ( mucinous ) tubular histology stage IA-IIA breast cancer , ECOG performance status 0-2 , margin great equal 2mm , node negative microscopic node disease , estrogen- progesterone-positive breast cancer , eligibility criterion must meet detailed describe herein .
